reviewText: As a homeschool mom this series is a must have for unit studies, CM style learning, eclectic and unschoolers. Can't say enough about the customer service and content. Excellent, excellent, excellent. If you are a living book leaner this is perfect. Works beautifully with co-ops also!
Bought the Solar system DVD first and my daughter nust loved and we decided to get the whole set. Can't go wrong with this purchase.
Good for many ages. My 1.5 year old loves it and so does my 8-year-old. Very educational.
These are the best preschool show I've ever seen!
